long_description: Stay confident on far-flung expeditions when you use the TourSafe EXP34 Wheeled Luggage from Pacsafe with its smart anti-theft technology, including the innovative Roobar(TM) anchor lock. Roobar anti-theft anchor locks zippers and multiple compartments together, and can lock your luggage to a secure fixture so you don't have to sleep with one eye open. All nylon panels in the luggage are protected with eXomesh(R) slashguard, a concealed, built-in metal mesh that helps prevent a slash-and-run theft. Lightweight yet durable molded EVA back is laminated with water-resistant nylon. Puncture-resistant ToughZip(TM) helps prevent forced entry into your luggage with a ballpoint pen or other tool; and helps prevent unwanted items placed inside your luggage. Stainless-steel 3mm locking cable attaches your luggage to a secure fixture, like a cafe table leg, so thieves won't run off with it; cable storage pouch included. Interlocking zipper sliders can take a TSA-approved padlock (sold separately); only 1 padlock required for multiple compartments with the Roobar anchor. Flap cover disguises Roobar locking system and makes a temporary hold for your jacket. Strong, lightweight reinforced-aluminum handle and high-clearance performance wheels with protective kick-plate, rails and corner bumpers let you maneuver rough streets easily. Front zippered compartment features 2 zippered mesh pockets for organization, and zipper access to the main compartment. Main compartment features 3 zippered mesh pockets and compression straps. External webbing side compression straps manage bulk; external webbing loops let you attach gear. Padded side and top haul handles let you grab and lift quickly. Pacsafe TourSafe EXP34 Wheeled Luggage also features a zippered luggage ID pocket, pen holder and key/wallet clip.
short_description: Stay confident on far-flung expeditions when you use the TourSafe EXP34 Wheeled Luggage from Pacsafe with its smart anti-theft technology, including the innovative Roobar(TM) anchor lock.
